name: Camus
description:
After the Glitch overran your sector, you took it upon your hands to pilot the experimental Camus-class attack-ship. 

Before thought to be the only hope for humanity, now it is the vector for humanity's last flight.

Instructions and warnings:

-Game might take a bit to Load on browsers; Also... Apparently, some browsers aren't opening it for some reason, in that case try a different one please :).

- Move with WASD;

- Left and Right clicks shoot and warp, respectively;

- Game might not look as nice in the WebGL version (some webgl shader nonsense), if you enjoy it, consider downloading the standalone version.

- Every so many waves you get new upgrades, this starts at 4 and increases for each upgrade you have.

This game was made in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace Jam #11, the entirety of it was developed by me with the following exceptions:

 - I already had some of the code for the background and the enemy shaders.

- The font is called  Nectar by Vladimir Nikolic (https://www.dafont.com/nectar.font)

- Music by
